options.content:
See Individual Tasks for $Country

Globus Tasks by Country
  • This dashboard shows top tasks with the specified country as the source or destination.
  • The first set of tables show top twenty data by both volume and rate and then the set of top pairs of organizations sharing data.
  • Other statistics about data to and from this country, including a Sankey graph for the top sources by volume, is then listed.
  • Globus Task endpoints are de-identified, and private data sources are marked "Private".
  • Private Task data rates and totals are available via the toggle at the top of this dashboard.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_country_name:$Country AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.src.community:$community AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.dst_country_name:""
meta.src_country_name:$Country AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.src.community:$community AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.dst_country_name:""
meta.src_country_name:$Country AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.src.community:$community AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.dst_country_name:""
meta.src_country_name:$Country AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.src.community:$community AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.dst_country_name:""

meta.dst_country_name:$Country AND meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst.community:$community AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.src_country_name:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

meta.dst_country_name:$Country AND meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst.community:$community AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.src_country_name:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)
meta.dst_country_name:$Country AND meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst.community:$community AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.src_country_name:""
meta.dst_country_name:$Country AND meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst.community:$community AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.src_country_name:""

meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND ( meta.src_country_name:$Country OR meta.dst_country_name:$Country ) AND (meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw}) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community)

options.content: Sankey Graph of Globus Tasks in and out of $Country

targets.query: meta.dst_country_name:$Country AND meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst.community:$community AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors
meta.src_country_name:$Country AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.src.community:$community AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors

(meta.src_country_name:$Country OR meta.dst_country_name:$Country) AND ( meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw}) AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors
